page.title: 16Mark Clubs and Recreation
page.content: {Clubs}in Mark cater for all ages and tastes. These Club names were taken from a recent Parish Magazine: {Mother's Union {Friendship Club {Women's Institute {Craft Club {Dressmaking Club {1st Mark Brownies and Guides {Conservative Association {Community Association {The Royal British Legion {Bible Study Group {Bell-Ringers Club {Youth Club {1st Wedmore Cubs (also Scouts) There is a variey of sports clubs: Cricket,Football,Tennis (with Brent Knoll) They also play badminton, skittles,darts,netball,hockey.They have Keep Fit and many activities are organised by the new Community Assoc.
